## FlyoutMetricsManager class

Calculates metrics for a flyout's workspace. The metrics are mainly used to size scrollbars for the flyout.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FlyoutMetricsManager extends MetricsManager 
```
**Extends:** [MetricsManager](./blockly.metricsmanager.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(workspace, flyout)](./blockly.flyoutmetricsmanager._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>FlyoutMetricsManager</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [flyout\_](./blockly.flyoutmetricsmanager.flyout_.md) | <code>protected</code> | [IFlyout](./blockly.iflyout.md) | The flyout that owns the workspace to calculate metrics for. |
